body:
Washington Bureau Chief Jerry Seib answers questions from readers about politics and international affairs, including why the two dominant political parties give so much weight to Iowa and New Hampshire when it comes to picking presidential candidates.

description: Washington Bureau Chief Jerry Seib answers questions from readers about politics and international affairs, including why the two dominant political parties give so much weight to Iowa and New Hampshire when it comes to picking presidential candidates.
title: Seib Video: Why Are Iowa and New Hampshire So Important in the 2016 Race?
